basics.name: Bohdan Herasymenko
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Hi! Brief introduction :) Bohdan Herasymenko 25 years old, Ukraine. Grew up in an industrial city of Kharkiv. In 2016 received Master's degree at National University of Economics, speciality: Informational Management Systems and Technologies. Began working while being the 4th year student in 2014 and since that moment acquired different technical and social skills. Consider open mindedness, willingness to learn and interest in tough challenges to be my strongest skills. I believe that friendliness, intelligence and decency are the most important qualities of any team member and always try to fit to these qualities :)

work.summary: Worked as an outsource employee at an e-commerce platform with headquarters located in US. The platform demanded fluency in every field available, from front-end development to optimizing DB performance or automating data migration with SSIS packages
highlights: Working as a cohesive member of a huge team (53 members)
High emphasis on DB and overall web-site performance

work.summary: As an member of outsourced team I was responsible for web development of new member portal, making full use of full development chain from DB to front-end.
highlights: Valuable experience of working with microservice architecture
Commercial experience Coffee script, Durandal, JADE, LESS web stack
Experience of working within 5-member SCRUM team

work.summary: As a member of a single-member team was in charge of optimizing and improving the platform's internal architecture, performance and back-end structure. Implemented various data migrations and set up multiple automated jobs, services and workers to keep platform internals consistent and in shape.
highlights: Successfully led various technical projects to successful completion
Experience of working as a single member of kanban team
Strengthened my skills within SQL Server and SSIS fields
Received valuable experience of asynchronous programming
Experience of working under pressure within tightly packed schedule

work.summary: The main project objective is providing the internal stuff of the company with a robust and highly performant CRM system, which provides functionality to import, transform, analyze and export data from/into various sources and allows employees to create various report and perform basic data mining with the ability of export and further analysis in external tools.
highlights: Experience of working within a performance oriented environment
